name: UpdateEventRule
description:
Update an existing event rule within a ruleset.

This tool updates an event rule in a specific ruleset in PagerDuty. It supports partial updates, allowing modification of any combination of writable fields. It is recommended to migrate to Event Orchestration for enhanced features. OAuth with `event_rules.write` scope is required.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the ruleset resource to update.

parameters.name: event_rule_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Event Rule to update within the ruleset.

value_schema.description: The id of the Event Rule to retrieve.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: update_event_rule_payload
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the event rule to update. Include 'rule_id' and any rule changes.

rule_id.description: The id of the Event Rule to update.
